page.title: 12HOUSING_ MY HOUSE
page.content:
I LIVE IN A LARGE SENIDETACHED HOUSE. IT HAS BEEN EXTENDED TO MAKE 2 MORE BEDROOMS.DOWNSTAIRS THERE IS A LOUNGE WHICH WE USE FOR SPECIAL MEALS AND DOING MUSIC PRACTISE.WE KEEP THE PIANO,THE RECORD PLAYER AND THE COMPUTER IN THIS ROOM.THE OTHER ROOM IS A PLAY ROOM.WE USE THIS ROOM FOR WATCHING T.V.WE EAT MOST OF OUR MEALS IN THE KITCHEN.WE HAVE A GAS COOKER,A MICROWAVE OVEN AND A DISHWASHER.NEXT TO THE KITCHEN WE HAVE A SMALL LAUNDRY ROOM AND A TOILET.UPSTAIRS THERE ARE 5 BEDROOMS AND A BATHROOM AND A SEPERATE TOILET.IN THE BATHROOM WE HAVE A YELLOW BATH A SHOWER AND A MEDICINE CABINET.MUM AND DAD HAVE A TELEVISION IN THERE BEDROOM AND SO DOES MY OLDER BROTHER.
BY {MEG TURNBULL }AGE8
